title: The Fall - Joshua Radin
text: by Absolootmuzic Love this song fallen!! I'm so excited for the release of this album . Joshua your music never disappoints!! Absolute beauty by Holly Page-Bjerke This song is simply stunning in the most beautiful and understated of ways. The raw emotion in the lyrics and vocals and the vulnerability in the musical arrangement give this song a haunting reminder of the human experience when we give ourselves over to love. Joshua Radin, your a true musical artist and storyteller, thank you for always being brave enough to tell the story. Rurik by Rurik53 I hope all the singer songwriters take their time to make an album with the sound and feeling that this one pushes tho you grate artist Biography Born: June 14, 1974 in Shaker Heights, OH Genre: Alternative Years Active: '00s, '10s Though Joshua Radin enjoyed singing during his childhood, the Cleveland native never intended to be a professional musician. Instead, he studied drawing and painting at Northwestern University, following his college years with stints as an art teacher, screenwriter, and art gallery employee. Eventually, Radin took a stab at songwriting and played one of his earliest compositions, "Winter," for his friend Zach Braff. The burgeoning actor/director took an immediate liking to the song, and "Winter"... Top Albums and Songs by Joshua Radin 1.
